Class PathFind

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Provides simple pathfinding.

    O

    • Method Detail

      • dijkstraWithHeap

        public static Node[][] dijkstraWithHeap(BattleMap map,
                        int startX,
                        int startY,
                        int range)
        Uses Dijkstra's algorithm to calculate the distances to other nodes through shortests paths from starting node. Paths themselves are not stored.
        Parameters:
        map - weights(moveCosts) for nodes are pulled from here
        startX -
        startY -
        range - will only check tiles within this distance from start coordinates.
        Returns:
        Node array with distances of shortests paths from start tile.
        See Also:
        speedRange

      • adjacents

        private static void adjacents(Node u,
             Node[][] map,
             MinHeap notDone)
        Checks which nodes adjacent to node u are valid (= within map borders) and relaxes them.
        Parameters:
        u -
        map -
        notDone - nodes(tiles) which have not been examined yet.

      • legit

        public static boolean legit(Node[][] map,
            int x,
            int y)
        Checks if given coordinates are within array.
        Parameters:
        map -
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        True if within.

      • relax

        private static void relax(Node u,
         Node v,
         int w,
         MinHeap notDone)
        Standard relax used by shortest path algorithms, except that edge weight is target node's weight(moveCost).
        Parameters:
        u - from-node
        v - to-node
        w - weight of edge, that is, moveCost of to-node v.
        notDone - nodes(tiles) which have not been examined yet.

      • initialiseSingleSource

        public static Node[][] initialiseSingleSource(int size,
                              int startX,
                              int startY,
                              BattleMap map)
        Initializes and constructs the node map used by dijkstraWithHeap.
        Parameters:
        size -
        startX -
        startY -
        map - battlemap
        Returns:
        Node array, all distances are 1000 except for starting node, weights(moveCosts) are pulled from battlemap.
